item.title: Getting started with google-visualization
item.description: Loading and Running # Google currently has two ways to load the JS library for Google Visualization (a.k.a Google Charts), gstatic loader (https://www.gstatic.com/charts/loader.js) and jsapi (https://www.google.com/jsapi). The gstatic loader is recommended because Google is transitioning away from jsapi to the gstatic loader. See transition reference In either case, you must first include one of the loaders with a script tag, typically in the head of your document, like this: <script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.
